concertsPage.title: Concerts
concertsPage.description: CRIV provides the artist tools and ideas to create, perform and disseminate their work. Its interdisciplinary environment fosters innovation by connecting international creatives and local audiences through an [immersive sound]-equipped live space. Our collaborative [platform] hosts two music programs spanning experimental to early music, enabling creation, revitalization and exchange.
